channel.title: [498] Verinia - 'Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery'
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dqIRMdm.gif[/img]
[COLOR=#0066cc][U][B]Links:[/B][/U][/COLOR] [url=http://Verinia.com/]Verinia Home[/url] [URL=http://Verinia.com/forums]Verinia Forums[/URL] [URL=http://verinia.com/highscores]Verinia Highscores[/URL] [URL=http://www.verinia.com/VeriniaGameClient.jar]Play Now[/URL]
[COLOR=#0066cc]Verinia is a 498 server where we aim to recreate all the content of the RuneScape 2008 era alongside some custom content. We strive for perfection, and do not accept anything but excellence on our part. This is Verinia, Experience the Perfection. [/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR=#FF0000]Developers [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/vip3r/]Vip3r[/URL] [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/torv/]Ethan[/URL][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[COLOR=#0066cc][U][B]Server Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yIG5rcM.png[/img] [/B][/U][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0066cc][U][B]Website Media:[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GemqtbK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4aHQWf2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9M1zOtt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bdw98Rj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VeeaqPD.png[/img] [/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0066cc][U][B]Special Media:[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OQHWQhD.png[/img] [/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0066cc][B][U]We Look foward to seeing you on Verinia![/U][/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#006400][U][B]Credits:[/B][/U][/COLOR] Vexia Emperor
[/CENTER]

item.title: [498] Verinia - 'Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery'
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Coldmedicine:

Stop making a new thread when someone is ‘mean’ to you.

Stop being ‘mean’ to people when they make new threads.

Read full topic
